actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 with respect to Federal employees serving on the Federal Council on the Aging.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to exclude retired Federal employees serving on the Federal Council on the Aging from the Federal provisions on annuities and pay on reemployment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 with respect to Federal employees serving on the Federal Council on the Aging.
